about_the_game:
Take a step back into the past, as you listen to the classic musical masterpieces from RPG Maker 2000.

Expertly arranged and re-mastered, RM2k Rearrange DLC contains your favorite music tracks and sound effects. Inspired by classic JRPGs, this audio pack includes the basics for creating that perfect game. Whether you're looking for that nostalgic, familiar feeling or are in the market for something new, RM2k Rearrange DLC is your go-to pack!

This pack contains:
- 10 expertly re-mastered BGM (music theme) tracks
- 100 brand new SE (sound effects)

●BGM
  • 2000_Blackmarket
  • 2000_Ending3
  • 2000_Fairy2
  • 2000_Field4
  • 2000_Game over3
  • 2000_Opening1
  • 2000_Shop3
  • 2000_Town1
  • 2000_Village1
  • 2000_Village2

●SE
  • Charge Powerup × 14
  • Combat × 16
  • Magic × 28
  • Map × 20
  • System × 8
  • Weapon × 14
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Add-on Vol.1: RM2k Rearrange Soundtrack & SE" and "RPG Maker MV - Add-on Vol.1: RM2k Rearrange Soundtrack & SE" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
